chapter.text: 76|1|Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka.
76|2|Hontōni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongō shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chōkaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa.
76|3|Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashī) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to.
76|4|Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita.
76|5|(Shinja no) zenkōsha wa, kāfūru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou.
76|6|(Soreha) arrā no shimo be-tachi ga nomu izumi no koto de, ware wa omoinomamani konkonto (izumi o) waki dasa seru.
76|7|Kare-ra (zenkōsha) wa chikai o hatashi, saiyaku no hirogaru hi o osorete iru.
76|8|Mata kare-ra wa, kare o keiai suru tame ni, hinja to minashigo to horyo ni shokumotsu o ataeru.
76|9|(Soshite iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa, arrā no o yorokobi o negatte, anata gata o yashinai, anata gata ni hōshū mo kansha mo motomemasen.
76|10|Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no kujū ni michita o ikarinohi o osoremasu'.
76|11|Sorede arrā wa, sonohi no saiyaku kara kare-ra o mamori, subarashī yorokobi o atae rareru.
76|12|Kare-ra ga taeshinondanode, kare wa rakuen to kinu (no i) de kare-ra ni mukuwa re,
76|13|sono (rakuen no)-chū de, nedoko no ue ni yuttari to mi o nobashi, kare-ra wa kokusho no taiyō mo, kōru samuke mo oboenaidearou.
76|14|(Jumoku no) kokage wa kare-ra no ue o ōi,(kajitsu no) bō wa tsutsumashiku tare kudaru.
76|15|Gin no mizusashi to garasuno-hai wa, kare-ra no ma ni mawasa reyou.
76|16|Garasu (no hai to mieta no) wa gin de tsukura rete ite, kare-ra wa konomi no ryō o sore ni mitasu.
76|17|Kare-ra wa soko de, shōga o mazeta hai no nomimono o atae rareyou.
76|18|Soko ni, sarusabīru to nadzuke rareru izumi ga aru.
76|19|Mata eien no shōnen-tachi ga kare-ra no ma o 往米 Shi, anata ga kare-ra o miru to, maki chirasa reta shinjudearu to omoudearou.
76|20|Anata wa shisen o mukeru to shifuku no sōdaina sangoku o shitatamerudearou.
76|21|Kare-ra wa utsukushī midoriiro no kinu to nishiki no soto i o matoi, gin no udewa de kazara re,-nushi wa kare-ra ni junryōna nomimono o noma se rareru.
76|22|`Hontōni kore wa anata gata ni taisuru hōshōdearu. Anata gata no doryoku ga uke haira reta nodearu.'(To ōse rareyou).
76|23|Ware koso wa, dankai o o tte anata ni kuruān o kudashita monodearu.
76|24|Dakara (dendō ni sen'nen shi), anata no omo no shinpan o taeshinonde mate. Kare-ra no naka no tsumi aru mono ya, fushinjin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai.
76|25|Asanayūna, anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi nasai.
76|26|Soshite yoru no ichibu o kare ni sajida shi, chōya no shijima ni, kare o tatae nasai.
76|27|Hontōni korera no mono wa, tsukanoma no seikatsu o aishi, jūdaina-bi o haigo ni sutesaru.
76|28|Kare o tsukuri, sono shishi o kataku baku gi tometa no wa ware deru. Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra to ruiji no soto no mono de oki kaeru koto mo dekiru nodearu.
76|29|Hontōni kore wa hitotsu no kunkaidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kare no omo e no michi o tora se nasai.
76|30|Daga arrā ga o nozomi ni naranakereba, anata gata wa hosshinaidearou. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
76|31|Kare wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o jihi ni yoku sa se, mata fugi no to ni taishite wa tsūretsuna chōbatsu o sonae rareru.
